title: New: LISBON – Native
body:
Newcastle quartet **LISBON** are beginning to spread their wings outside of the North East, and with a tour coming up supporting Eliza & The Bear, they’re likely to keep gaining fans at a rapid rate.

New song and live favourite, _Native_, is another punchy-three minute number, lifted from their forthcoming EP, **_Life Is Good_**, expected later this year.
